Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/Richmond
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Pratt, California, and Devon due to, street blockage near Devon/Richmond.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Pratt, California, and Devon due to, street blockage near Devon/Richmond.

Allow extra travel time.
